content: Is there a place where I can view all the official Rust books that get into details of the language and implementation? There is the getting started book, the reference book, rustc book, rustc development book, the unstable book, the nomicon book. Is there anything more? Probably FOMO but I would like to know if I have missed any.
That's it, I think. Maybe the forge? https://forge.rust-lang.org
There is https://lborb.github.io/book/ which is a collection of a bunch of official und unofficial rust books
@Lukas Wirth Thanks! This is exactly what I wanted.
https://github.com/ctjhoa/rust-learning repo is a nice learning links compilation too
